choicesHtml: a carved inscription, which lists the succession of caliphs in the Umayyad dynasty
representations of falcon eggs, which were symbolic of the Umayyad Caliphate
a portrait of the owner, which depicts him seated on an ornate throne
scenes of a lion hunt, which expresses the victory of the Umayyads over the Nasrid dynasty
